Flowly - Enhance Your Online Courses with Fluid and Organized Communication

Flowly is a Chrome extension that enhances your experience on online learning platforms by adding practical and intuitive features. Organize your interactions, highlight important messages, and boost your productivity with tools like automatic mentions, synchronized reactions, and smart highlights.

Features:

- Question Highlighting: Easily highlight your questions to never miss them.
- Simplified Mentions: Mention others with auto-completion and highlight messages for the mentioned user.
- Interactive Reactions: React in real-time with emojis and see who reacted.
- Moderator Messages: Make moderator messages stand out for better visibility.

Improve the clarity and flow of your communication on the BigBlueButton online learning platform with Flowly!
